about_the_game:
Hardware Store Simulator: Demo

Experience 5 days of retail chaos in this free demo! Build your store, compete with friends, and get a taste of what it takes to run a successful hardware business.

🏗️ DEMO FEATURES

  • Experience full multiplayer functionality with up to 4 players

  • Design and build your store from the ground up

  • Manage 5 in-game days of operations

  • Test physics-based item interactions

  • Experiment with pricing strategies

  • Hire and manage staff

  • Learn the basics through our tutorial system

🎮 WHAT'S IN THE DEMO

  • Complete store building and design tools

  • All basic management systems

  • Full multiplayer functionality

  • Physics-based gameplay mechanics

  • Basic inventory selection

  • Core staff management features

  • Initial tutorial experience

⏰ DEMO LIMITATIONS

  • Limited to 5 in-game days

  • Reduced product catalog

  • Basic department options

  • Limited warehouse expansion

  • Core events only

This demo gives you a hands-on preview of Hardware Store Simulator's chaotic retail management gameplay. Race against friends to stock shelves, deal with the physics-based mayhem of daily operations, and see if you can create the most successful store in just 5 days!

----

Note: This demo supports both single-player and multiplayer modes for up to 4 players, with all core physics and competition mechanics intact.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3550
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1070 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: A chaotic multiplayer retail management sim where you compete with up to 3 friends to build and run the best hardware store in town. Design your store, manage inventory, deal with physics-based mayhem, and outmaneuver your rivals in a dynamic market where every decision impacts the competition.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
